subject: Olympic Games (2014)
Snowboarding
lead_paragraph: Greg Bretz, one of the few snowboarders who has defeated Shaun White in the halfpipe, will ride alone in Sochi. But his father will be there, as he has been all along.
snippet: Greg Bretz, one of the few snowboarders who has defeated Shaun White in the halfpipe, will ride alone in Sochi. But his father will be there, as he has been all along.
